functions.name: describe_file
functions.description: Describe the content of the file.

summary.description: Describe in detail the functionality being defined or implemented in this file. Be as detailed as possible.

items.description: Path to a file that is referenced in the current file, relative to the project root.

response.summary: This file is the main entry point for a React application. It imports React and ReactDOM to render the main App component into the root element of the HTML document.
